data.actual_result: League client bug splat loops until Discord is closed out. Disabling Overlay while the loop occurs does not fix it.
data.expected_result: League client shouldn't crash, and overlay should inject smoothly into the verified game.
data.short_description: League of Legends crashes with a bug splat loop when Overlay is enabled.
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch League of Legends - Have Overlay enabled
